record.title: ADDITION OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2205
record.narrative:
ADDITION OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2205 -- (House of Representatives - October 03, 2008)

[Page: H10814]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to be added as a cosponsor to H.R. 2205.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Illinois?
